thread.title: BRIEF-Ligand Pharma To Receive Total Potential License & Milestone Payments Of Up To $533.8 Mln, Per Agreement With Roivant

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ligand Pharma To Receive Total Potential License & Milestone Payments Of Up To $533.8 Mln, Per Agreement With Roivant

organizations.name: brief-ligand pharma to receive total potential license & milestone

text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Ligand Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* LIGAND PHARMACEUTICALS - PER TERMS OF LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH ROIVANT, CO TO RECEIVE TOTAL POTENTIAL LICENSE & MILESTONE PAYMENTS OF UP TO $533.8 MILLION
* LIGAND PHARMACEUTICALS SAYS NOW ANTICIPATES 2018 TOTAL REVENUE TO BE APPROXIMATELY $184 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2FuuOFX ) Further company coverage:
